name: Great Victoria Desert
hint: Largest desert in Australia, spanning Western Australia and South Australia

name: Great Sandy Desert
hint: Second-largest desert in Australia, home to vast red sand dune fields in Western Australia

name: Tanami Desert
hint: Remote desert in the Northern Territory, one of Australia's most isolated regions

name: Simpson Desert
hint: Desert famous for its long parallel sand dunes, the longest in the world, in central Australia

name: Gibson Desert
hint: Central Australian desert named after explorer Alfred Gibson who perished crossing it

name: Strzelecki Desert
hint: Desert in northeastern South Australia, named after Polish explorer Pawel Strzelecki

name: Tirari Desert
hint: Small desert in South Australia near Lake Eyre, with some of the hottest temperatures recorded

name: Little Sandy Desert
hint: Arid region in Western Australia adjacent to the Great Sandy Desert, with spinifex grasslands
